title: Knife of the Undermountain King
content:
by: A'jak'nir Jeera, Quartermistress

Knife of the Undermountain King Notes & Tips for BG3

Rarity: Very Rare Value: 480 Weight: 0.9 Despite its description, Organ Rearranger works on any attack roll, including offhand weapons, ranged attacks, and spell attack rolls, reducing the roll needed to Critically Hit by 1. Shadow Blade is currently bugged. When first using the weapon it works as intended, but as soon as the game is saved and reloaded the character no longer has advantage. 025e162a-45ec
